    • Constructor Detail

      • IconButton

        public IconButton​(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                  java.lang.String imgpath,
                  ClickInterface clickAction)
        Creates an IconButton, sets the image and onClick action.
        Parameters:
        parent - PApplet to be drawn to
        imgpath - path to the IconButton's icon
        clickAction - FunctionalInterface, accepts lambda expressions and method references.

      • IconButton

        public IconButton​(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                  java.lang.String imgpath)
        Creates an IconButton and sets the image. Will also print a message saying that onClick() is undefined.
        Parameters:
        parent - PApplet to be drawn to
        imgpath - path to the IconButton's icon
        See Also:
        setClickBehavior(ClickInterface)

    • Method Detail

      • setToggleable

        public IconButton setToggleable​()
        Sets the button to toggle. Returns an instance of this as part of the Fluent Interface.
        Returns:
        updated instance of this component

      • setClickBehavior

        public void setClickBehavior​(ClickInterface clickAction)
        Defines what code is run when the button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        clickAction - lambda expression or method reference

      • draw

        public void draw​()
        Draws the button. Should not be explicitly called by the user.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Placeable
